idea-plugin.name: Elm Language Support
idea-plugin.description:
Support for Elm language.

Please understand this plugin is still in BETA. It is a very early release. There are probably bugs on some systems. I am doing my best to make sure the plugin is stable and add more features. If you have any problems, please send me an e-mail and I will do my best to help you out.

Currently supports syntax highlighting and basic error checking. You must have elm-make installed for this plugin to work.

I want programming Elm on IDEA to be as fun as possible. I welcome all feedback and suggestions.
